sentences: Issues Relating to the Implementation of Kyoto Protocol Article 2.3 (Adverse Effects of Policies and Measures): Chair Abdulla introduced this issue, noting that little progress had been made in previous discussions.
The EU and JAPAN emphasized that these issues are covered by other agenda items, and the EU added that the Article should be considered after COP/MOP-1.
Chair Abdulla said he would convene informal consultations.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
